original_title: Bruno B. The World's Luckiest Guy
overview: Let us introduce to you Bruno B, your average guy living in Montreal, and looking for something exciting to do. He started out driving girls around for a production company and before he knew it he was sampling the goods. A lot of these girls have gone on to be stars and they owe it all to their very first fuck, Bruno B! This movie has 9 gorgeous girls in 9 hot scenes all shot in POV!
tagline: Bruno Fucked Them All Before They Became Stars
title: Bruno B. The World's Luckiest Guy
